name: BLOCK ISLAND 40-1
notes:
Originally called the VITESSE 40 and built in Holland. The molds were purchased by  Beetle Boat Co. (a division of American Boat Building Co.)
This was one of the earliest production FG boats of this size. 
Later, the molds were aquired by Metalmast Marine. The version they built has a separate spade rudder and reverse transom. (BLOCK ISLAND 40-2) and was built until 1978?. 
A much more recent version (1985?) has a hull similar to the original but with redesigned deck and coach roof.
